titles: The tryal and conviction of Thomas Knox and John Lane for a conspiracy to defame and scandalize Dr. Oates and Mr. Bedloe thereby to discredit their evidence about the horrid popish plot : at the Kings-Bench-Bar at Westminster, on Tuesday the 25th of Novemb. 1679 ... : where upon full evidence they were found guilty of the offence aforesaid.
author: Knox, Thomas, 17th cent.
Lane, John, 17th cent.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
notes: Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
keywords: Knox, Thomas, 17th cent --  Trials, litigation, etc.
Lane, John, 17th cent --  Trials, litigation, etc.
